name: The Teapot
desc: Sarah brought cake. Neither could I see her nor did I know if she actually existed, but still, I appreciated the gesture.

name: The Wall
desc: “I don’t know anymore where I can go.” Marcus said. The floor collapsed below him while another appeared, but where the wall was before. Confused, he took a step to the side, or down, depending on the angle.

name: The Objects
desc: They were strange. I could not grasp what they were supposed to do. Some were levitating, but also they weren’t.

name: The Room
desc: My whole world happens within this room. Am I still inside? Is this the new outside? What does ‘outside’ even mean?
